content.text: Hey! I'm a woman in my mid 30s. I'm married to my wonderful husband and we have two small dogs. I own my own small marketing consulting agency and I love Radiohead. What about you?
I'm a man in my early 30s. I'm engaged and I work as a contractor for a cab company. I'm taking courses online and I love rock music and ice cream.
Cool! It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm also a fan of rock music and ice cream. I'm not sure what your favorite band is, but mine is Radiohead.
I love Radiohead too! They're one of my favorite bands of all time. I also like a lot of other rock bands, like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Pink Floyd.
I love all those bands too! My favorite Beatles album is Revolver, my favorite Rolling Stones album is Exile on Main Street, and my favorite Pink Floyd album is Dark Side of the Moon.
Those are all great albums! I love Revolver too. My favorite Rolling Stones album is Beggar's Banquet, and my favorite Pink Floyd album is The Wall.
I love Beggar's Banquet too! The Wall is also a great album. What other music do you like?
I also like a lot of indie rock, like The Strokes, The National, and Arcade Fire. I also like some hip-hop, like Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
I like all those bands too! I love The Strokes, The National, and Arcade Fire. I'm not as big on hip-hop, but I do like Kendrick Lamar and J. Cole.
Those are all great bands. I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
